content: materials to make one hand towel you ll need… - 2 skeins of purl soho s field linen 1 100% linen each skein is 295 yards/ 100 grams approximately 444 yards required we used the colors ink blue galapagos teal natural flax and queen anne s lace - us 4 3 5 mm straight or 24-inch circular needles 3 - if using straight needles two us 4 double pointed needles 4 for i-cord gauge 26 stitches and 48 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern size finished dimensions 15 inches wide x 25 inches long designed by purl soho designer jake canton 5 click here 6 to see even more of jake s designs 1 https //www purlsoho com/field-linen 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=969 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796_23802 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23799 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/jake-canton-for-purl-soho/ 6 http //www jakecanton com/
